name: Offroad Bus Hill Transport Sim
description:
Get ready to enjoy the most realistic offroad Bus hill transport Sim and become the real driver of school going students and other tourist. The bus game has real hill world offroad experience with massive thrilling turns and tricky roads. You have played many games now step to simulation of real offroad experience, get the hands on wheel and steer the big bus with passengers in tour bus and drop them on their actual place.

Make the best road journey with your passengers out of the wonderful bus driving experience and get more and more coins and bonus. Get the bus parking on the bus terminal, pick up the passengers and tourist in driver bus, make them understand about the road trip and be careful while driving in hill and mountain areas. Try to save smashing with other cars, bikes and jeeps.

Experience the real world nature and let the people in tourist bus live the moment with tour bus. All new adventure buses and kids will love to enjoy in such situation where the holidays are spent on mountain areas. Show your bus driving skills by playing this transport bus driver game and become the supper driver in your city.

Features:
Animated Passengers
Amazing hill station environment
Interior and exterior views
Wonder full natural 3D environment
Smooth Steering, Brakes and Drifting
